Hike tariffs on Chinese EVs, Senate Democrats urge Biden administrationThree Senate Democrats from auto manufacturing states on Thursday urged the Biden administration to hike import tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles to address national security risks, the latest push by lawmakers to protect the U.S. auto sector. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 18:14:30 GMT BEMZEOAHEBJ55IURNL7WW2SEYI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/senate-democrats-urge-biden-administration-hike-tariffs-chinese-evs-2024-03-07/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
Novo Nordisk expects China to approve Wegovy this yearNovo Nordisk said on Thursday it expects Wegovy to be approved for sale in China this year and plans to soon launch the popular weight-loss drug in the largest Asian market with capped volumes. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 16:34:07 GMT W7R4OHOK2FOQ3BLGGWKIFDF5IU https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/novo-nordisk-expects-china-approve-wegovy-this-year-2024-03-07/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China growth target achievable if backed by more stimulus, analysts sayChina's 5% economic growth target for 2024 announced this week is ambitious and can be achieved if backed by further stimulus measures in monetary, fiscal and regulatory policy, analysts said. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 15:14:07 GMT 6MZ5H22DTZO7DLXFBQNI5JMXKE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-growth-target-achievable-if-backed-by-more-stimulus-analysts-say-2024-03-07/Anisha Sircar市场亚洲市场
China interference in Lithuania polls 'can't be ruled out', says security chiefChinese interference in this year's elections in EU and NATO member Lithuania "definitely cannot be ruled out" due to Lithuanian support for Taiwan, the chief of Lithuania’s counter-intelligence said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:31:32 GMT B3OXQQWJ4NONJFJVOBQ2AEJAS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-interference-lihuania-polls-cant-be-ruled-out-says-security-chief-2024-03-07/Andrius Sytas世界
TikTok crackdown bill unanimously approved by US House panelThe U.S. House Energy and Commerce committee on Thursday unanimously approved legislation giving China's ByteDance six months to divest from short video app TikTok or face a U.S. ban. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:02:45 GMT 76D576RYEZNSVG2SPX4UAURVFY https://www.reuters.com/technology/new-push-congress-ban-tiktok-or-force-chinese-divestiture-gains-steam-2024-03-07/David Shepardson技术
Top official from China's Xinjiang says 'Sinicisation' of Islam 'inevitable'Xinjiang's top Communist Party official said on Thursday that the "Sinicisation" of Islam in the Muslim-majority region in northwestern China, where Beijing is accused of human rights abuses, is "inevitable". Thu, 07 Mar 2024 10:16:07 GMT XLARL7MJUZN5JFVR67IMEF45U4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/top-official-chinas-xinjian-says-sinicization-islam-inevitable-2024-03-07/Laurie Chen世界中国
